Talk106:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I wonder where Oaki went. Maybe he's
hiding in the Great Deku Tree's mouth...

If you wanna know where the mouth is,
it's right above the Spore Store.
Talk100: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Hey! You! Can I talk to you for a minute?
Talk101:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I...went for a walk, and now I can't get
back to Korok Forest...

And my friends I was walking with jumped
into this <clr:0000>weird hole<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>They said we might be able to go back to
the forest through the hole, but...do you
think it's safe?
Talk102: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh...<sp:5:1:0> Maybe you can talk to me later...
Talk103:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseM>My friends jumped into this <clr:0000>weird hole<clr:ffff>!


They said we might be able to get back to
the forest through the hole, but do you
think it's safe?
Talk104:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Since the <clr:0000>Lost Woods<clr:ffff> returned to normal,
I was able to make it back!

Korok Forest is so peaceful, huh?
Talk105:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>By the way... <sp:5:0:0>Have you seen a Korok
named Oaki? <sp:5:0:0>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>You don't even know
who Oaki is, huh?
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmmm. I wonder where he went.<sp:5:0:0>
Maybe he's hiding in the Great Deku
Tree's mouth...
If you wanna know where his mouth is,
it's right above the Spore Store.
